text: This article shows the rosters of all participating teams at the women's football tournament at the 2015 Pan American Games in Toronto. Rosters can have a maximum of 18 athletes. ==Group A== === Argentina=== Head coach: Julio Olarticoechea === Colombia=== Head coach: Felipe Taborda === Mexico=== Head coach: Leonardo Cuellar === Trinidad and Tobago=== Head coach: Ross Rusel ==Group B== === Brazil=== Head coach: Vadão === Canada=== Head coach: Daniel Worthington The following players are on the roster for the 2015 Pan American Games. Stats are accurate through July 11 games against Ecuador. Not in roster, backup === Costa Rica=== Head coach: Amelia Valverde === Ecuador=== Head coach: Vanessa Arauz == References == Women's team rosters Category:Pan American Games football squads
title: Football at the 2015 Pan American Games – Women's team rosters
